Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GuiManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientGameManager
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GuiManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientUpdateListener, DisconnectionListener, Runnable
public class GuiManager extends ClientGameManager implements DisconnectionListener
Class GuiManager represents the manager of the GUI
